1.title: First set of groups

11.content:
Summer holidays were over for a week now and the second school week was ending today. Henry Matthews was sitting on his seat in the teacher's lounge and let out a deep sigh. It was really hard for him right now. He just moved into city, got this job as a mathmatics teacher and was now simply overwhelmed with learning all the new names of his students and fellow teachers. He had no time to catch a breath.

"It seems like yesterday that I was back home and now all these new faces... This is just exhausting.", he thought as he leaned back. Right now he looked more like a bored student than a teacher.

Henry was 33 years old, recently divorced, had short, brown hair and glasses. Currently he was wearing a brown suit and a tie. He never felt comfortable with the casual look when teaching. It just made him feel as if he was just some guy in front of a class and not a teacher.

"You're looking tired.", said a voice suddenly from beside him. Henry nearly fell over because of surprise. He looked to where the voice came from and saw a beautiful looking hispanic woman. She had long, curly, black hair, C-Cups and was wearing a pink t-shirt and rather tight fitting jeans. Not as tight as those of some girls in the school. She was the youngest teacher with 29 years.

"You're... wait a minute... You're Manuela Sanchez, right?", asked Henry slowly. She nodded and smiled at him. "Yeah right.".

"At least one name I have learned.", he laughed and she joined his laughter. "Yeah, that's nice.", she replied. "You're Henry, right? You look exhausted.".

Henry nodded slowly. He was not sure if he should talk about his problems and decided not to. He did not want to bother her with his problems. "Yeah... It's quite exhausting. Just moved in my new apartment and now have to learn all the names and faces of the students as well as the other teachers.", he explained more than he really intended to. There was just something at her that made him want to tell her that.

"I see.", she replied and then stopped in thoughts only to ask him seconds later: "Hey, me and some other teachers's we're going to play a game later. How about you join us? To relax.", she suggested.

Henry thought about it for a moment and then shrugged his shoulders. "Why not? It might be fun. Also I'd get to know some of my collegues better. When and were going to meet?", he asked her.

"After school here in the teacher's lounge. We're normally the only ones left here on a friday.", she explained.

-----------------

Henry got through the day and was happy that it was over. The kids were really horrible to new teacher's and tried to tease him were ever they could.

"I just hope this will get better.", he sighed when he arrived in the teacher's lounge. She really was telling the truth. The lounge was like a ghost town except for the four people who had rearranged the tables so everyone could sit on one table.

"Ah, Henry.", smiled Manuela. "You're the last one. Come here, sit down.".

Henry nodded and walked slowly over to the table while looking at the other teachers and trying to remember their names.

On the left of Manuela was sitting a small man with brown-gray hair. He was chubby and wore a green vest, blue shirt and khaki jeans. His name was Theodore Anderson if Henry remembered it correctly. He was 42 years old and was teaching biology.

On Theodore's left sight was a red haired woman. She was 52 years old but still looked great. She had slightly sagging D-Cups. She was wearing a red floral-print dress. Henry could see that she had her nail painted in a matching red. Her hair was rather short, just covering her neck. Her name was Andrea Flemming if he remembered it correctly. She was teaching English.

Beside Andrea was a slim man with white hair. He was 53 years old. He was wearing a blue t-shirt and jeans. He looked skinny and his skin was crinkly. He was the husband of Andrea and called Edward. His subject was Physics.

Last but not least, there was a woman just beside Edward. She was tall, had blonde hair pulled back in a ponytail and looked very fit. She had B-cups. Henry remembered that she was the girl's coach. Signs of age were showing in her face with her age being 39 but she still looked like she could outrun most of the students easily. Her name was Erica Jameson.

Henry then sat down and looked at the others. "Soo...", he began nervously. "What are we going to play?".

Andrea looked at him and grinned broadly. "Oh, something very special. You see we have these incredible cards. We play with them every week for 3 years or so.", she explained and tried to make him curious. Edward meanwhile put a strange box on the table from which he got the cards.

"You see, these cards are special...", said Manuela and began explaining.
11.title: Group of teachers

112.content:
The rules are as following.
You play a normal round of poker but instead of betting money, you bet traits of yourself. The traits can be anything you can name. The traits are not equal in worth, some are more worth than others. A list can be found below.

The game will be played like a normal poker game, you bet and the one with the best hand wins. The winner can choose to either swap his traits with those in the pot or swap these with the other players. You can't swap back traits you had when you began the game. It is possible to win and lose other traits throughout the game. For example it is possible that Henry get's a vagina, loses it and wins the same again during the game. He can't swap his own penis back.

Swapping ages or genders does not change you physical. People just think of you that you're that old or the opposite gender.

It doesn't matter what you bet, it is possible that there are several of the same trait in the pot. It's not possible to swap a hand for a foot or something like that.

At the start of every hand, two people have to place a pot. The person dealing has to give in traits worth 1 points, the person right to him/her has to give traits worth 2 point. That then circules clockwise the next hand.

When someone set bets, the other players have to bet equal or more points to continue playing, e.g. Andrea has a bets traits worth 4 points, then the other will have to bet traits worth 4 or more points.

Reality adjusts to the swaps. It is only possible to leave the game table in between hands not when the game is played.

All swaps can be reversed any time after three days when all players gather, put their hands on the card box and saying a magical formula.

Trait - Points
Small body parts (e.g hands, feet, lips... etc) - 1 Point
Small Possessions (e.g. jewelry, single books, single dvds) - 1 Point
One clothing article - 1 Point
Personal Infos (e.g. Age, name... etc) - 1 Point
Larger body parts (e.g. torso, legs, face... etc) - 2 Points
'Medium' Posessions (e.g. small personal library, DVD collections) - 2 points
Skills - 2 Points
Male/ Female body parts - 3 Points
Major posessions (e.g. cars, houses) - 3 Points
Gender - 3 Points
Personality changes - 4 Points
Whole Outfit - 4 Points
Life - 5 Points

"Okay...", mumbled Henry. It took him some time to understand what they had just said.

Manuela smiled at him."I know it's hard to believe. I couldn't believe it myself when they told me this when I got here 2 years ago but it's real. Every teacher knows of the cards and we all occasionally play together. Normal we play on mondays and swap back on fridays. Sometimes we stay swapped over the weekend.".

It was almost too much for Henry. He could not believe what he heard. "You're crazy, right?".

Andrea shook her head. "No, we're telling the truth.". Her husband nodded. "Yup. I was the bride of my daughter's wedding.", he laughed. Henry remembered that Andrea told him that they had a daughter a year younger than Manuela.

"Let's just try it out, ok?".

Henry nodded and Manuela began dealing the cards. "Since I'm dealing, I'll have to put traits worth 1 point in the pot. Since Theodore is sitting left to me and is clockwise the next one, he has to put two points in.", she explained while dealing.

Then everyone had their cards, the box was placed in the middle. "Okay... Let's see...", mumbled Manuela. "I'll set my shoes.".

Then suddenly a hologram emerged from the box and it showed black boots with a 2-inch heel just like the ones Manuela was wearing. The hologram floated over to Manuela.

Henry gasped amazed. A second ago he thought these people were crazy but he was suddenly believing them.

The others were unimpressed and Theodore was making his choice. "I'll set my hair and my nose.", he said and an image of hair which looked like Theodore's appeared as well as an image of a nose which resembled Theodore’s greatly and floated over to the biology teacher.

Now that everything was set, they started playing. Henry looked at his cards and smiled. "Not bad.", he thought. He looked over to the others.

"Let's start small...", said Andrea. "I'll set my dress.", she said and an image of her dress was floating beside her.

"I'll fold.", said Edward. "This hand is just no good.".

"Okay then. I'll raise. I'll set my face and my job.", said Erica and an image of her face appeard floating beside her and a small holographic sheet of paper with "girl's coach" written on it.

Henry gulped. It was his turn to place a bet. "Erm... I'll bet...", he said. "You now have to bet traits worth 3 points, remined Manuela.

"Er... yeah... thanks...", he stummered and looked at the points list. "Let's see...".
112.title: Poker with bets

1121.content:
“I’ll set my gender…”, he said. “Can’t hurt to lose that… right?”.

Nobody answered. Another image began emerging from the box and then floating over to Henry. It showed the male symbol.

They continued and it was Manuela’s turn. “I’ll fold.”, she said and put the cards away. Theodore did the same.

“Is your hand that bad?”, asked Andrea. “Normally you don’t fold, Theodore.”.

“Well, you know me very well.”, laughed Theodore. “And yeah, my hand is horrible. No point in playing and losing more than I would want.”.

“Well, I’ll bet as well.”, said Andrea smiling. “I’ll set my voice.”. An image of a music note appeared.

“I’ll check.”, said Erica. Henry checked as well.

“Now, I want to see what you two got.”, said Andrea when she showed her cards. The others showed them as well. The winner was Henry.

“I won.”, he said disbelievingly. “But what now? What do I have to do?”. It was like the box or the cards or whatever it was what was doing all of this, could understand him. In front of Henry formed an holographic table and the images which were floating around the players flew towards the table. Small figures appeared around the table. They just looked like the people who were sitting on the real table.

“You have to touch the trait and then drag and drop it on one of the players. Then the swaps will occur.”, explained Manuela.

Henry did as he was told and touched the dress icon first. He looked at the small figures and dragged the dress over to the figure which looked like himself. He was overwhelmed with everything that was happening that he did not realize what would happen if he did this. The moment the dress touched the figure the swap occurred. Henry was suddenly wearing Andrea’s red floral-print dress.

“Holy!”, exclaimed Henry. Manuela giggled at him. “You haven’t thought about what would happen, right?”, she asked him. “That happens to everyone.”.

“Er… yeah… I’ll have to be more thoughtful…”, he said and looked amazed at his dress. He then looked back at the holograms.

He touched the hair symbol and then dragged it over to Andrea. Andrea’s red hair changed brown and grew short and Theodore’s did the exact opposite.

Henry continued, dragging the male symbol over to the Erica figure. Nothing happened. “You’re considered a woman now.”, explained Erica. “And I’m a man now. Don’t worry, you don’t have to wear make-up or something. Your life is mostly the same except that everyone thinks you’re a woman.”.

Henry nodded to show her that he understood and continued. He took the boots symbol and dragged it over to his own figure. His black shoes turned into the black boots.

“I guess since I already have a dress…”, he said and continued. He took the nose symbol, the note symbol and drew it over to the Edward figure. Edward’s nose changed to look like Theodore’s. He did not say anything but Henry guessed that his voice was now that of Andrea.

Henry took the face and the sheet of paper and dragged them over to Theodore. Theodore’s face changed to that of Erica. “Girl’s coach again?”, said Theodore and raised an eyebrow. I already was last week… Well, it’s not written in stone yet.”.

With that every swap was chosen and the game began from a new.
1121.title: The first hand played

11211.content:
"About how many hands are we planning on playing?" Henry asked the group.

"We usually like to play enough hands so everybody gets to deal once, but since it's your first time and it's a lot to take in we can stop at any time for you new guy. We'll put up the cards and swap back on Monday." said Edward a little bluntly.

Henry chuckled at hearing Andrea's voice coming from Edward's mouth, "Oh no, I'm all up for that, I was just curious. I think I'm in for six rounds." Henry said not wanting the others to think he couldn't take this or anything.

"And his name in Henry, Edward," Manuela said on Henry's behalf.

Theodore grabbed the cards, "That's a good sport. I'm dealing and I'll put in my teeth." An image of teeth appeared in front of him, "I've got a dentist appointment this weekend and don't want to go in with these wooden teeth." He said flashing his yellow/brownish teeth to the group.

"Ugh, put those away." Andrea said, "I'll put up my pantyhose and my hands," and so her leggings and hands showed up from the box.

"Another crap hand. I fold." Edward said. Henry was still amazed to hear Andrea whenever Edward spoke.

"I'll put in my breasts." Erica said matter of factually and the image of her breasts floated before her. Henry upon seeing the images we uncensored looked away. A few people at the table chuckled. "Don't worry Henry, at some point you'll have them and at some point you'll be sick of them. I appreciate your modesty, but we're all going to be some of your best and closest friends here. Really, it's okay to not look away."

"Okay, thanks." Henry said still not looking in Erica's direction as he asked, "Does knowledge count as a skill?"

"Indeed it does," Edward said, or at least his voice from Andrea said.

"Well, I was wondering if I could wager knowledge on students. Just so maybe this weekend I can take notes on special cases and try to learn about them a little bit quicker." Before anyone could answer a blank sheet of paper entitled 'knowledge of students' appeared in front of him.

"Apparently so." Manuela said looking at her cards, "I'll fold this hand."

"I'll check." said Check.

"And to put the pot right, I'll add my lips." Theodore said.

"Okay everybody, show your cards." Erica said. This hand went to Theodore with a full house.

"Alright, that's good news for me and bad news for my dentists boat payment." Theodore said as he started to look at everybody and what had been bet. "Manuela, I think I'll take your pretty smile to the dentist." He moved the proper pieces around, Henry looked to his left at Manuela as she smiled at him with Theodore's now lipstick coated lips, showing off her new stained teeth and then laughed at the sort of troubled look on Henry's face.

"Don't worry about it, there are no hurt feelings at this table."

Theodore continued his dealings with the bet placements. "We'll keep Andrea's hands and pantie-hose in the family." He said as he gave Andre's bets to her husband Edward, "As for you Henry, Edward has been here the longest, so his knowledge of the students might be the best." He put Henry's lack of knowledge onto Edward and suddenly Henry felt his mind expand with knowledge of hundreds of students and their hobbies, activities, grades, relationships, and just about everything a teacher could pick up. "That leaves Erica's bet. I suspect you would prefer a flat chest so it's easier for you to exercise as usual right?" Erica nodded and Theodore let loose a smile. "Alright, I say we give Henry a first hand look at those B cups so he doesn't feel as awkward at the table. It'll do you some good."

Before Henry could say "What?" he felt his chest balloon out into Andre's dress. "But, what? huh?" Henry said while just starring at his chest.

"He doesn't seem to be embarrassed to look at them now." Erica joked while doing some arm stretches across her flat chest giving the group a good laugh before the next hand.
11211.title: The second round begins

112111.content:
By the time Henry was done looking at and testing out his new physics he saw that Andrea had already delt out the next hand. She must have seen his surprise, "Sorry, did you need more time to get used to your new additions?" Blushing Henry drew jerked his gaze away from his breasts that were now jiggled noticeably around in his new dress. "No. No." He just said embarrassed getting smiles from the rest of the table. "Don't worry Henry. We've all been there." Theodore said referencing himself and Edward.

Edward seemed to be about so say something, but Andrea prevented him by saying, "I'll start off with my eyebrows," and two lines appeared floating before her. "And I'll bet my legs." Edward said taking his wife's cue to speed the game along. Erica and Henry both folded. Manuela said, "I think I'll go with my face, I need something goes more along with the mouth and teeth."

Henry was a little weirded out by the statement, he never thought he'd here a woman talking about (for lack of a better word) uglying herself up for fun. I guess knowing that everyone can swap back by next week will really let you be more daring with how you do some things in your life.

Theodore was next up, "I'll put up my job," and the sheet of paper with 'girl's coach' written on it reappeared. "I don't mind it, but I don't like to have the same anything for two sessions in a row."

"Most of us prefer it that way," Manuela told Henry in a sidebar.

Andrea put some thought into evening out the pot but decided against it. Everyone then showed their hands and Edward won with a three of a kind. "Come to papa." Edward said as he started to rearrange the bets. "Erica, since you will be working out more than usual this weekend, you might as well have some legs that you can do some good for." Erica sighed as the swap took place, Henry sitting next to Erica looked as her once firm toned legs became flabby. "Honey, I think I'll give you Manuela's eyebrows." So Andrea's eyebrows became a little more manicured looking while Manuela's looked a little more natural. "Manuela, you might as well have the face to match the teeth." This change freaked Henry out a little more than the others. Henry looked at Manuela and where once beside him had been a stunning face, was now a Hispanic and slightly more feminine version of Theodore. Manuela just laughed at the look of uneasiness on Henry's face, "Hey! It's not that bad." Theodore said. "Sorry," Henry quickly muttered while Theodore just laughed. "No offense taken."

Edward didn't seemed to have noticed or cared too much as he was still concentrating on the pot. "Theodore, you want something different huh? You haven't been a math teacher before." And he put the 'girl's coach' paper onto Henry. Andrea looked at her husband disapprovingly, "Edward! Henry is still trying to adjust and you change his job on him! And to the girl's coach no less."

Henry sat there uncomfortably while Andrea continued to scold her husband for his 'insensitivity' but Henry spoke up to stop it. "Andrea it's really okay. I'll have to do it sooner or later. I guess this is a good way of jumping right in."

"Don't be silly." Andrea said, "Just put up the job for a bet later on and we'll switch you out of it. Yes you'll probably do it later on, but you should not be doing something that you aren't comfortable doing only your second week on the job."

Henry agreed with Andrea but not wanting to seem uneasy in front of everyone just said, "No it's okay, maybe I will put it up later for a bet, but it's a part of the game and I knew that going in."

"No you didn't." Manuela said. "You don't have to try and act okay with everything done here. This is a fun game but I'm not going to lie there have been tricky times. This isn't a bad one, but Edward still shouldn't have done that."

Edward just sat there looking embarrassed, "Yeah kidI mean, Henry. They're right. I wasn't thinking of the consequences when I did that. I'll tell you what, I'll put my job up next round no matter the hand and swap with you. Least I can do."

"Thanks, but physics really isn't my strongest subject."

"And teenage girls are?" Erica said getting a laugh from the room.
112111.title: Time for Round 3 of swapage

1121111.content:
„Okay then…“, mumbled Edward as he dealt the cards. „Since I’ve kinda messed up… I’ll bet my job.“. Then a sheet on which “physics” was written on it.

Erica was next putting something into the pot. “Okay… I have to put in two points… Let’s see… I’ll bet my sports skill.”. Another holographic sheet of paper appeared with the word ‘sports’ written on it.

Then everyone looked at their cards and Henry began betting. His cards looked good, very good. “Okay.”, he said and tried to put on his best poker face. “If I bet something and I win, then I can decide to keep it, right?”.

Manuela nodded. “Yeah. Only traits of losers have to be swapped.”, she explained.

With that knowledge Henry began thinking of what he should bet and began betting. “Oookay. Let’s see. I’ll bet my underwear and my name.”. An image of his boxershorts and a sheet with his name on it appeared.

“2 points then…”, mumbled Manuela and thought what she should swap. “I’ll bet my life.”, she said and everyone gasped. A small ball which looked like a ghost or soul appeared besides Manuela. “It’s strange that it doesn’t show a sheet with something written on it like in other cases but I guess it describes your soul which is integral to your life. Or something like that. Nobody understands the reason.”, she explained to Henry.

“I’ll fold.”, was the immediate reaction of the following three players. They wanted to tell Henry that Manuela was normally rather timid and only bet much when she knew she would win. The teachers knew how the others were playing, no wonder considering that they played the game for years now. The three decided against telling Henry because where would be the fun in it if he knew it?

Manuela grinned dirtily at Henry. “So, what will you do?”, she asked. She knew that the other teachers knew how she played and normally tried to cover it so that it’s not that everybody folds but now she wanted to test Henry.

“I’ll go with you.”, said Henry confidently. He was sure that he would win. “I’ll bet my genitals.”. An image of a penis appeared beside Henry.

Manuela thought for a moment if she should bet more and see how far he would go but decided against it. She did not want to scare Henry away.

“Okay, show me your cards.”, she said and showed him her own cards. She enjoyed the view when Henry’s mouth fell open and he only showed his own cards unwillingly.

“I guess I won.”, she said. “Don’t worry. I won’t be too hard.”.

She looked at the objects she had to rearrange. “Okay, let’s see. Let’s begin with Edward’s job. I know you won’t be comfortable with being girl’s coach Henry, so here we go.”. She dragged and dropped the physics sheet on the Henry figure. “I think Physics will suit you better.”.

“Thanks…”, he said and was not sure if he could really ‘endure’ five days of teaching physics.

“Next… I’ll keep my life.”, she moved the soul to her own figure.

“Since I guess you’ll be girl’s coach Edward, I’ll give you Erica’s sports skills. That way you can at least do a much better lesson. Erica, you’ll get Henry’s name. You’re already considered a man so that will fit. You’ll also get Henry’s underwear, since he already has your beasts. Last but not least, I’ll get Henry’s penis.”. The last words formed a grin on her face.

Henry was surprised when suddenly his boxershorts turned into soft panties and a bra formed around his chest. He felt empty between the legs when his penis had vanished and was replaced by Manuela’s vagina. Henry could be mistaken for a woman if it had not been for his overall body structure minus his female anatomy.
1121111.title: Round Four (Version 1)

11211111.content:
Henry sat there amazed for a while as he put his hand over what was now his vagina, he was just so surprised by the flatness that was now his crotch. This was apparently showing on his face as Manuela gave a little fake cough to get his attention. Henry blushed and quickly put his arms on the table so nobody would get any ideas about what was going on. "Sorry," Henry said meekly.

"It's okay, we understand it's a new experience for you." Andrea said in an almost motherly faction.

It also will probably help if you continue to just think of yourself as Henry," Manuela said. Henry was a little confused at this advice, but just assumed that it was based on experience and said, "Thanks."

"Now that we've got that settled, it's my deal." Erica said and while dealing the cards she said, "I'll go ahead and put in my hair." As soon as all the cards were dealt a long pony tailed head of hair popped up in front of her.

"Um," Henry said trying to think of what to put in, "I'll go with my arms I guess."

Everyone looked at their hands and Manuela and Theodore instantly folded. Andrea however looked rather confident, "I'll bet my life," she said as the soul figure appeared before her.

Edward folded and said, "Well whoever wins just know that tonight is meatloaf night,"

"Why do you think I'm betting?" Andrea said getting a laugh from the group.

Erica looked intensely at Andrea and Henry before saying, "I'll raise you my entire wardrobe," Erica said smiling and what looked like an open closet with a bunch of tiny articles of clothing hanging up. Henry looked at his hand and folded not wanting to lose any more than he had to. Andrea smiled at Erica before saying "I'll call you with my vision," and a piece of paper that said 20/30 popped up.

The two ladies showed their hands with Andrea turning out to be the victor with 3 kings beating Erica's 3 queens. "Alright, let's see what we've got here," Andrea said, "I think I'll be keeping this," Andrea said referring to her eyesight and then went back to the board. "Well I was thinking of trying to be someone else for a week, but since it's meatloaf night I'll keep it in the family." Andrea said as she swapped lives with her husband. "Guess I'll be going to that mother/daughter girls night this weekend." Edward said, "You know you like those," Andrea said kissing her husband on the cheek.

"Just remember now you're the one who has to do the yard work," Edward said with a grin. "Darn, you're right." Andrea said, "Well I think I know how to make that a little easier," Henry knew immediately what she meant, and so he looked down at his arms as they went from being fairly lean and muscular to very feminine and much softer. I'm never going to get used to this. Henry thought to himself.

"Well if you're going to be the mom this weekend, you might as well have the hair for it." And so Edward's head of white hair became Erica's long blonde lochs. Henry turned to Erica and laughed when he saw Edward's white hair on her head all put together in a rather silly faction with Erica's scrunchy. Realizing how silly she looked she took it out and offered it to Edward which he politely refused.

"And last but not least, we have this," Andrea said while fiddling with the representation of Erica's wardrobe. Smiling she said to Henry, "It'd be such a shame for you have such a nice body only to go home to a bunch of boring old suits." And before Henry could say something in his defense, she made the swap. Henry had been expecting (and kind of hoping) that the dress he would wearing would be put on Erica and he'd get the sweat pants and t-shirt she had on but that wasn't the case. Manuela saw his confusion and explained, "Basically what that swap did was just change the cloths that are at home. The cloths you bring to the game aren't affected by a wardrobe swap."

"Alright," Henry said wrapping his mind around what was going on, "So the next time we play I'm going to have to come wearing this dress to school?"

Theodore answered, "Well it doesn't have to be next time we play. You can bring that dress back whenever you feel like it. We've all got cloths the belong to each other at home. Maybe next time I'll wear the skirt I'd swapped with Manuela. You may think it weird, but if you saw me showing of my legs in that thing you'd actually find it completely normal."

Henry was about to refute that claim, but after seeing the cards in action decided against it.

"All right, with that cleared up it's time for the final hand of the evening, Henry. You're up." Erica said sliding the cards over to him.

112111111.title: Last Hand (Version 1)

1121111111.content:
As Andrea and Edward collected and put the cards back in it's case everyone said their goodbyes for the weekend. Henry took notice to Manuela giving him a hug just before he left. Henry couldn't help it, but he did blush a little at this, he tried to hide his face a little bit when he felt it flush up but he noticed her smiling at him and blush herself.

Henry made his way back to his car, (making sure to concentrate a little more with each step due to the small heel in his new boots) and got in to drive home. Over the course of the ride home Henry really felt the changes to his body. When he'd sat down, he'd noticed that he actually had to concentration a little bit about where his dress was so he didn't accidentally rip it or even 'reveal' himself. He noticed that when turning the steering wheel he had to put more force into it than he normally did due to his slightly weaker arms. But the thing he noticed the most were his breasts. When he put on his seat-belt he couldn't help but feel the strap press against them, and then when he turned down one of the bumpier roads he really noticed there was a lot of bounce that he wasn't used to.

Finally he got to his home. He groaned at the sight of all the packed up boxes that he still hadn't even opened yet. He'd been planning on trying to make a dent in it this weekend, but now with these changes it didn't really seem all that important anymore. Interested to see what he had waiting for him he went to his bedroom and opened up his closet. He had been expecting it, but Henry still stood in awe at all the new cloths that were stuffed into his tiny closet. Since it was Erica's wardrobe Henry had been expecting alot of pants and sweats, but surprisingly there weren't many, she actually had a number of nice skirts, blouses, and dresses hanging up. Henry dug in the closet for a while in slim hopes of finding some slacks or a button up shirt he'd feel comfortable wearing to school on Monday but alas he found none. "So on Monday I can either wear a skirt, athletic shorts, or sweatpants. Fantastic." Henry said to himself, "Well I guess I'll worry about that later." So Henry shut up the closet and made his way to his kitchen for a nice dinner.

Henry poured himself a bowl of milk and cereal and just sat on the couch and turned on the tv. There may have been alot of weird changes to his life the last few hours, but he saw that as no reason to change his normal routine. After an hour or so the phone rang. Henry jumped a little as it was actually the first time since he'd plugged the phone in that he'd gotten a call. After getting over the slight surprise he went over and answered the phone. "This is Henry," he said waiting for whoever was on the other line to reveal themselves.

112111111121.content:
Henry woke up the next morning as he usually had done on Saturday since his divorce. He just stayed there in bed for a while. He just lay back and thought back on what had happened to him. But this time instead of dwelling on the negatives in his life like his ex, he thought about his new life at his new job, and even his new friends. No matter how old one gets, it's still a nice feeling to have new friends when you're feeling down. After reflecting on this for a little while he felt his stomach grumble and finally got up to get breakfast.

Henry couldn't help but chuckle at himself and his new body as he made his way to his kitchen, me made sure to walk slowly to just really get a feel of himself. Henry got his bowl and poured his usual bowl of cereal and poured his milk, only to find it was empty. "No problem." Henry said to himself as he made his way back to the fridge, only to open it and find a half a stick of butter and baking soda. "Darn, guess there really isn't a way out of this," Henry said as he shut the refrigerator and made his way back to his room to get dressed for a quick trip to the grocery store. He took off his house robe and grabbed the first set of thick and baggy sweat cloths he could find. He was about to go out the door before he saw himself in the mirror. What he saw actually disgusted himself to a degree. Standing in front of him wasn't the handsome young man he thought of himself as. What he saw was a woman who happened to have his face just looking sad and disheveled. He'd never bothered to care about appearances before, but with this body he was himself in a sort of new light and he didn't like what he saw. "Man, is this really how I've looked to people the last few months?" Henry thought out loud.

Seeing that pathetic image of himself seems to have been the spark Henry needed to get his life off and running again. He quickly took off the sweat cloths and went back to the closet to find something that would make him look and feel good. For a minute he thought about wearing one of Erica's dresses she had hanging up, after all he had worn a dress yesterday, but decided that he wanted to wear something Henry might wear as opposed to Erica. He finally found a nice pair of blue jeans and a maroon blouse that didn't look too girly. For the first time in a while Henry spent a good amount of time combing and styling his hair so that it would look darn good. To top it off, just because he was now feeling a bit daring, Henry put on the pair of boots from yesterday with the heels in them rather than go a pair of sneakers he had on before. Just before he tried to leave again he got another look at himself in the mirror, he smiled at the weird, but still good looking in it's own way image looking back at him. He was ready to build his life up again, starting with a little trip to the grocery store.

For the first time in months Henry not only got milk, cereal, and some sodas from the store, he went all out with eggs, fruits, veggies, assorted meats, spices, the whole nine yards. He was going to start treating himself and his body right. He even felt as he was pushing the cart down the aisles that he had a new bounce to his step that had nothing to do with his breasts. After filling up his cart he made his way to the checkout line where he recognized the clerk as one of his students. "Hello Rocky." Henry said to the boy who, after his knowledge switch with Edward, he knew was a member of the football team and didn't pay much attention in class.

"Oh, hi Ms. Mathews. You getting groceries today?"

"Yes, that's why I'm at the grocery store Rocky."

"Oh yeah" Rocky said sounding a little embarrassed, "Hey Ms. Mathews? What chapters did you say we have to study for the physics test Monday?"

Henry didn't know the answer to the question, but had a good guess what the right answer was, "The same chapters that we went over in class Rocky."

"Oh yeah. Thanks Ms. Mathews." Rocky said as he finished bagging Henry's groceries. "Would you like me to carry them to your car?"

"I think I can handle it." Henry said but after he got out of the store had second thoughts. Maybe I should have let him do the work, Henry thought as he pushed the heavy cart full of food products over the rocky parking lot. He was practically exhausted by the time he back to his car, he actually had to stop for a breather. Someone seemed to have noticed this and came over to ask Henry if he needed help.

We swapped back after the ceremony so that the newly wedded couple could have their wedding night.", she grinned at him when she told him the last thing.

"I see... What are the capabilities of these cards?", he asked. "And what else can they do?".

Manuela smiled excited. "Everything you can imagine. They also have another interesting function. You can relive memories. Like really relive. It's like you are living them in the moment but with every other swap that had been taken place. Except when you swapped memories with someone. Then you are still yourself but everybody in the memory will see you as the person.".

Henry shrugged his shoulders. "So what? I can remember my memories and I guess if I swap memories I can do that as well.".

"Yeah you could but because it's magic you can explore what would have happened. And in a better way than in your mind. Since it's magic the people will react like how they would really react no matter what you do. It's the best entertainment in my opinion. I think this function was originally intended to help us understand swapped memories or our changed life.".

Steven, Jason and Julie were 16 year old teenagers and were looking through a garage sale. The house were the sale was held looked old and creepy. Never the less, there were many antique things. Most of them were garbage but it did not hurt to look. The three had nothing else to do anyway.

"Look at that.", said Steven and pointed out to a small figure of an owl, made out of wood. "This looks creepy...", shuddered Julie and turned away. "It looks like it's going to attack me.".


"You think so? I think it looks kinda nice.", replied Jason and took the figure in his hand. "Look, it likes you.", he said grinning and brought the figure near Julie's face who instantly stepped away.

"JASON!", she screamed. "I really could punch you in the face sometimes!". With these words she turned around and got over to Steven who already turned his attention to another item.

"What are you looking at?", she asked him curiously. He pointed to a box positioned on a table. "This thing.", he said. "It looks strange... It makes me feel strange... I don't know... But I somehow get the feeling that it is calling out to me. Maybe I should be it?".

Julie looked closer at the box. "I can't see anything strange... Looks like a normal box with a creepy images on it. But it looks nicer than the owl figure over there.".

Steven grinned at his friend. "I don't think so. You only see it that way because you're afraid of owls.".

Julie shook her head hysterically. "Absolutely not! Owls are just horrible being which should all be killed!".

Steven laughed. "If you say so... Well, I guess I'll buy this box. Can't hurt to look in it later, right?".

"Why not open it now?", asked Jason who had put the owl figure down and was now standing behind his two friends and looked at the box just as curious.

"It's locked, duh.", replied Steven and pointed at a lock at the front of the box. "And unless you want to break it open and get in trouble, I'll have to buy it.".

With that, Steven went to the old man who did the garage sale and bought the box for 5$ and got the key with which he could open the box. He looked strange at Steven but did not say anything. Steven thought nothing of it and left the garage sale with his friends.

At home, the three friends were sitting on the ground and were looking at the box.

"Open it, Steven.", said Jason impatiently. Julie nodded in agreement.

Steven took the key, his breath got heavier. He had no idea why. Slowly he opened the box and the friends saw it's content. Cards. Curious, Steven took the cards out of the box.

"The game is played like a normal poker game until someone wins a hand. The winner is allowed to swap a trait with one of the losers just by saying the word "I want to swap X with Y". The swap will take place immediately. If the winner does not decide what he wants to swap after a period of 2 minutes, the cards will decide for him. There are four special joker's in the game. If someone wins with one of these in his hand, the winner decide what two losers may swap. Again, the winner has a time limit of 2 minutes and has to use the phrase "I want that X swaps Y with Z". It is allowed to get the jokers out of the card deck if you want to play without them. The swaps are permanent for a period of 48 hours. After that you can swap back traits you previously owned. It is not possible to get a trait you started with or you had during the game. It is possible to swap swapped traits with other losers. After 48 hours, the traits will be available for the person again. Reality will adjust, everyone who is not participating in the game when the swap took place will not notice anything strange even if confronted directly with the swap. Just before one of his friends could answer although the answer would have just been the same question Steven had asked. From the box emerged black smoke which formed a cloud. Then red eyes appeared. The eyes seemed to look directly at the three although the three were positioned in a triangle around the box.

"Ah! Freedom! I'm finally free!", said a voice which came presumably from the cloud. The eyes seemed to look even more at the three. It felt like they were looking directly into the soul. "And I have new victims.", chuckled the voice.

"Victims?", asked Julie shocked and earned another deep chuckle from the voice.

"Yes, victims. You see, I'm M'Rtlor. I'm a... how would you humans call it? Ah, yes. A demon. I'm imprisoned in this box and these cards. No matter what I do, I can't get free but that doesn't mean I can't have my fun.".

Steven could swear he saw a faint mouth with a big grin in the cloud.

"These cards are special and you are my prisoners right now.", the disembodied voice explained. "You can't escape from this realm if I don't allow it. Here come the cards in play. I'll allow you to leave if you play my game.".

"What kind of game?", asked Julie frightened.

"A wonderful one.", chuckled the voice. "I'll grant you freedom if you gain 100 points in my game but be warned! If you get negative points you'll die.".

Jason gulped. "And how do we get points?", asked Jason.

"I was coming to that point. Why are you humans always so impatient? You see this board?". A board appeared beside the box. It had three rectangles at the top and three at the bottom. "You can see the three rectangles at the top. Each one of these belongs to one of you. At the top there will be a picture of some person displayed. The ones at the bottom are for the cards your friend has dropped. The rectangles on the left belong to you, girl. The one in the middle belongs to the boy on your left (Steven) and the last one to the boy on your right (Jason). When the game begins a picture appears and a card. You will swap what is on the card with the person. Then you will have to... Hm... Let's see... Let's begin small, you have to live two days with the swap.".

"And what has this to do with these points you mentioned?", asked Steven.

"Yes, the points. You will have to pretend that the swap is normal. Reality changes to accomodate but people are able to notice the changes if you act strange. If you act like you should in this reality than everything is alright. If you "survive" the time limit than you'll get 5 points. If you're spotted, so someone finds out about the swap, you'll be transported back here and lose 20 points. Remember if you get negative points then you'll die.".

"But! You can't do this! This is impossible!", yelled Julie.

A depp laugh could be heard. "You sound like you have a choice. And to make things more interesting for me: You have to swap with a person from the opposite gender. Okay, now then. We will start.".

142.content:
The rules are as following.
You play a normal round of poker but instead of betting money, you bet traits of yourself. The traits can be anything you can name. The traits are not equal in worth, some are more worth than others. A list can be found below.

The game will be played like a normal poker game, you bet and the one with the best hand wins. The winner can choose to either swap his traits with those in the pot or swap these with the other players. You can't swap back traits you had when you began the game. It is possible to win and lose other traits throughout the game. For example it is possible that Henry get's a vagina, loses it and wins the same again during the game. He can't swap his own penis back.

Swapping ages or genders does not change you physical. People just think of you that you're that old or the opposite gender.

It doesn't matter what you bet, it is possible that there are several of the same trait in the pot. It's not possible to swap a hand for a foot or something like that.

At the start of every hand, two people have to place a pot. The person dealing has to give in traits worth 1 points, the person right to him/her has to give traits worth 2 point. That then circules clockwise the next hand.

When someone set bets, the other players have to bet equal or more points to continue playing, e.g. Andrea has a bets traits worth 4 points, then the other will have to bet traits worth 4 or more points.

Reality adjusts to the swaps. It is only possible to leave the game table in between hands not when the game is played.

All swaps can be reversed any time after three days when all players gather, put their hands on the card box and saying a magical formula.

Trait - Points
Small body parts (e.g hands, feet, lips... etc) - 1 Point
Small Possessions (e.g. jewelry, single books, single dvds) - 1 Point
One clothing article - 1 Point
Personal Infos (e.g. Age, name... etc) - 1 Point
Larger body parts (e.g. torso, legs, face... etc) - 2 Points
'Medium' Posessions (e.g. small personal library, DVD collections) - 2 points
Skills - 2 Points
Male/ Female body parts - 3 Points
Major posessions (e.g. cars, houses) - 3 Points
Gender - 3 Points
Personality changes - 4 Points
Whole Outfit - 4 Points
Life - 5 Points
